transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello ji mam.
Executive: Ji good morning sir, Richa baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se aapki new account manager.
Customer: Ji mam bataiye.
Executive: Ji sir services ke regarding baat karni thi ki abhi aapki services kaisi chal rahi hai koi problem to nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Mam abhi tak to aisi koi problem aa nahi rahi hai at present.
Executive: Han.
Customer: Aur main aapko thodi der se contact karu actually main kuch abhi sath mein recently kaam leke baitha hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha thik hai to fir aap mujhe time bata dijiye aap kitne baje tak call karenge ya to main kar lungi us time pe.
Customer: Aap mujhe 2 baje ke something.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Thik hai fir main 2 baje ke baad aapko call karti hu.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive inquired about the services.

- Customer wants to be contacted later.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call the customer later.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 2 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- services, call, account manager
